COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x118
STRING: After dinner, Torta, Ninna, and I sat peacefully around
the dinner table.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12e
STRING: Ninna's cooking was amazingly delicious as always.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x144
STRING: I could find no other way to describe it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x150
STRING: With delicious food like that in our mouths, we spoke...
Or it would have been nice if we could have.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x166
STRING: Perhaps it was because Torta and I were paying too
much attention to each other, but the conversation
continued clumsily.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17c
STRING: Ninna must have understood most of what was going
on.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x192
STRING: She didn't say anything, but each time our conversation
stalled, she'd heave a deep sigh and change the topic
for us.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b2
STRING: We talked many times about our hometown, but
strangely, Arietta's name didn't come up.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e4
STRING: [Ninna] “Well, I think I'll get us some more tea.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x216
STRING: [Torta] “Oh, I'll do it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x248
STRING: [Ninna] “No, it's okay. Both of you stay where you are.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25e
STRING: [Chris] “Umm... Okay then.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27c
STRING: [Ninna] “Chris. You are my guest, so you can just stay
seated over there. I will make us all some nice warm
tea.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c2
STRING: [Torta] “So I'll help...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f4
STRING: [Ninna] “Torta. Are you trying to take away my only
entertainment? Making delicious tea after a meal is my
hobby.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x328
STRING: She said that, but she still attended concerts like always,
and I think she also said that cooking was a hobby of
hers.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x348
STRING: Of course Torta and I knew that Ninna was leaving the
room out of consideration for us.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x35e
STRING: But this time I couldn't feel truly grateful for the gesture.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x378
STRING: Ninna made sure we had nothing else to say, gave a
satisfied smile, and disappeared into the kitchen.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x38e
STRING: Left behind, we looked at each other's faces, then cast
our eyes down.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3c2
STRING: Every time I saw Torta since that day I hugged her had
been like this.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3d8
STRING: We obviously couldn't worry about it during practice,
but when we met in the practice room in the morning,
and when practice was over at night, we shared few
words, only having businesslike conversations.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3fa
STRING: I didn't plan to explain what happened.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x406
STRING: I didn't want to apologize either.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x412
STRING: All I did was tell her how I felt, and I couldn't even do
that well.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x428
STRING: The shadow of guilt deep in my heart was certainly the
reason for that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x454
STRING: I hadn't made any decisions about Arie yet.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x460
STRING: I couldn't write a new letter like Torta did, either.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x476
STRING: My heart was starting to lean toward Torta.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x484
STRING: And the truth was, I wasn't actually trying to move it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x490
STRING: But just because I liked Torta... I couldn't break up with
Arie for such a simple reason.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4a6
STRING: I liked Arie, too.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4b2
STRING: I couldn't believe how terrible I was.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4be
STRING: My indecisiveness would probably hurt the both of them
even more.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4d4
STRING: That was the most likely outcome.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4e2
STRING: But I would wait at least until the graduation recital was
over.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4ee
STRING: With that excuse, I waited for Arie's letter.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x550
STRING: [Torta] “Are you thinking again?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x566
STRING: Torta's voice pulled me back into reality.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x572
STRING: Her voice was kind, with no hint of blame.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x57e
STRING: And my heart ached again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x592
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah... Sorry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5c4
STRING: [Torta] “You don't have anything to apologize for.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5da
STRING: Torta said this lightly and grinned.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5e6
STRING: It reminded me so much of Arie.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5f2
STRING: Whenever I came out of one of my reveries, Arie would
be right by my side, gazing at me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x608
STRING: Then when I noticed her looking, she'd say, “Thinking?”
and smile.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x63a
STRING: [Torta] “Finally, only one week left. Oh, but the recital is
on a Friday, so that's only four days.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x65a
STRING: Torta continued naturally, like her heart was really in it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x678
STRING: [Torta] “We can only have Ms. Cordell listen to us one
more time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x698
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6ca
STRING: [Torta] “Did you hear who Asino's partner is?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6e0
STRING: [Chris] “Hmm? No, I haven't.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6fe
STRING: [Torta] “A cute first-year student.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x714
STRING: [Chris] “Huh... So he found someone. That's just like
Asino.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x746
STRING: [Torta] “It's a young male voice student, so that's
surprising.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x75c
STRING: [Chris] “Huh...? Huh!?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x78e
STRING: [Torta] “Oh, so you are surprised.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7a4
STRING: [Chris] “He said he wanted a girl for a partner.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7d6
STRING: [Torta] “It seems he's staying away from girls.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7ec
STRING: [Chris] “Staying away...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x802
STRING: Asino did say something about getting dumped...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x80e
STRING: But if he really got dumped, he wouldn't do that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x81a
STRING: [Chris] “But why do you know, Torta?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x84c
STRING: [Torta] “He told me when I saw him at school the day
before yesterday. I thought you knew, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x86c
STRING: [Chris] “He didn't say anything when I saw him on
Monday.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8a8
STRING: [Torta] “Maybe he decided after that?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8be
STRING: [Chris] “Oh... But I guess that's one less thing to worry
about.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8f0
STRING: [Torta] “It was a while ago, but he said the same thing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x906
STRING: [Chris] “Why...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x938
STRING: [Torta] “Because you found a better partner than you
deserved, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x958
STRING: [Chris] “Is that something people normally say about
themselves?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x98a
STRING: [Torta] “Oh, it was Asino that said it. Well, there was a
little sarcasm mixed in.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9aa
STRING: [Chris] “I suppose that's believable...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9dc
STRING: [Torta] “Hey, that's mean!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9f2
STRING: [Chris] “No, I think you are a better partner than I
deserve.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa2e
STRING: [Torta] “Really?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa44
STRING: [Chris] “Really.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa76
STRING: [Torta] “I... I see. Hey... Stop saying that with such a
serious face.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa96
STRING: [Chris] “No... I just look serious because it's true.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xab4
STRING: [Torta] “Idiot...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaca
STRING: [Chris] “Oh come on...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xafc
STRING: [Torta] “That was a compliment. Oh, that's a good smell
from the kitchen, I'll go help her.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb1c
STRING: Torta had her say, and disappeared into the kitchen.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb28
STRING: I had to somehow return my blushing face to normal
before Ninna came back.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb78
STRING: [Chris] “Oh... Okay, it's late so I'll be going.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbaa
STRING: [Torta] “Yeah. See you tomorrow.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbdc
STRING: [Ninna] “Hee hee. Come again.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbfe
STRING: The uncomfortable atmosphere between us returned a
little to normal thanks to Ninna.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc14
STRING: Ninna laughed as if she knew that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc20
STRING: I didn't feel grateful for that at first, but that was a huge
mistake.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc36
STRING: Any reason would have been fine.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc42
STRING: All I needed was time to really talk to her, face to face.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc58
STRING: And I didn't mind what we talked about, be it aimless
conversation or just chatting.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc6e
STRING: Not in a place where we could escape into practice, or
a place where we could get away from each other right
away saying, “See you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc84
STRING: I needed time like that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc90
STRING: Ninna must have understood that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcd2
STRING: [Torta] “Don't be late.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xce8
STRING: [Chris] “I know. I'll ask Ms. Cordell to listen to us again,
too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd10
STRING: [Torta] “Yeah, please do.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd26
STRING: [Chris] “Okay...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd50
STRING: [Chris] “See you tomorrow...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd82
STRING: [Torta] “Oh, never mind. See you tomorrow.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdac
STRING: [Chris] “Y-Yeah...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe04
STRING: I found myself thinking of Torta on the walk home.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe10
STRING: What was the expression she had worn at the end?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe1c
STRING: And then... I solved that question right away.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe2a
STRING: It was Sunday.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe36
STRING: The day Arie's letter would arrive.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe42
STRING: Torta went outside once before we ate.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe4e
STRING: It was because Ninna asked her to go shopping, but it
was already evening at that point.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe64
STRING: Had she already read it, or not?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe70
STRING: Both were possibilities.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe7c
STRING: But more than that... The problem was that I almost
didn't care about that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe92
STRING: When Phorni asked me that morning what time I'd be
home, I just said after dinner and left.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xea8
STRING: Phorni just grinned and said good bye.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xec0
STRING: I didn't think I had totally forgotten.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xecc
STRING: But somewhere in my mind, I was putting it off.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xed8
STRING: Until I went home at night.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xee4
STRING: Until I read Arie's letter.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xef0
STRING: And...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xefc
STRING: Until the graduation recital was over.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf08
STRING: That's all I was thinking about.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf14
STRING: But now I realized it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf20
STRING: I had to give a clear answer to this problem right away.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf38
STRING: Torta's smiling face that I saw today, and the strained
face she showed me at the end.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf44
STRING: I didn't want to make Torta look that way anymore.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf5e
STRING: Then I realized that I already had the answer.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfc2
STRING: Chris. I read your letter.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfee
STRING: This time her letter started with that short sentence.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x102a
STRING: Chris. I read your letter.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1040
STRING: I told you not to write your feelings about me, but you
did it anyway.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x105e
STRING: If you hadn't done that, I could have told you my
thoughts more clearly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x107c
STRING: You're too kind, Chris, it's not fair.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1090
STRING: But this is a problem we have to be clear about.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10b0
STRING: I knew that you liked Torta, Chris.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10ce
STRING: But that's why I wanted you to say in your letter that
that wasn't the case.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10ec
STRING: I wanted you to make me feel better.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1100
STRING: But you're kind, Chris, and that's not fair. So you told me
the horrible truth, but then said you like me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x112a
STRING: You can't say things that will give me hope like that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x113e
STRING: Because I'll believe what you say and wait for you, Chris.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x115c
STRING: But I've decided not to wait for you, Chris.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1170
STRING: Because I know that Torta likes you, too, Chris.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1190
STRING: You're far away, so I can't see you.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11a4
STRING: You've been feeling further and further away to me, and
I realized that I'm not worried about you at all anymore,
Chris.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11c4
STRING: Torta is always with you.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11d8
STRING: Because she cares about you, Chris.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11ec
STRING: I just can't do that anymore.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1202
STRING: Now just listen to what Torta says.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1216
STRING: And if you really do like Torta, then believe her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1234
STRING: Even if you don't know what it means now, I think you'll
understand some day.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1252
STRING: Please don't forget my words until then.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1272
STRING: And please don't write a reply to this letter.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1290
STRING: Because I'll think of you, and I'll cry.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12ae
STRING: Arietta.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12ea
STRING: I read it over and over, and it took quite a while before I
finally realized it was a break-up letter.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1300
STRING: It had been my plan to write a letter breaking up with
Arietta.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1316
STRING: I thought I couldn't apologize enough, so my plan was
to just write the words and tell her my true feelings.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x132c
STRING: But now there was no need for that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1338
STRING: Was this... Was this the result I really wanted?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1344
STRING: [Chris] “Arie...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x135a
STRING: That name disappeared without reaching anyone's ears,
swallowed by the air.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1370
STRING: I could do nothing but accept the fact.
